Articles.Content:
I just saw Fonso and was hit by a huge wave of nostalgia for the Planet Ideas thread before the wipe of April '13... The huge moon with the mountains stretching above the atmosphere's edge... Awesome.

FONSOOOOOOOO!

I have a request: Do Prominatus and it's moons form my Kerbol+ idea: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88952-Kerbol-Planets-Pack-Idea

I'll see what I can come up with! There won't be any visible rings, though. Voon and Orbo are both supposed to have them, but neither has any that are depicted here.

The reason for that is the boring perspective and the need to save space.
Great! When do you think you'll be done with Prominatus?

How about this one?

Edited August 10, 2014 by Felsmak

Oh my kod... That. Is. AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I Love it! To bad you can't see the rings, but it's still beautiful! I'm definatley looking forward to the rest of the moons and planets! (And the comet!)

I'm glad you like it! I'm also done with all its moons except Fonso (Daphy is just a speck at this scale, by the way). I'm having some difficulties with the terrain as it's not gonna be obscured by clouds this time, but I could just move on to Hyphat while I think, or something.

I still think you should finish Fonso before moving onto Hypat (You misspelled it, but that's okay). Maybe you shouldn't put the canyons on Fonso, and focus more on making it look like it has 2 atmospheres. (Well, you know what I mean by "2 atmospheres")

And I absolutely can't wait for the moons! Keep up the fantastic work!
Hey Felsmak, can i add Voon's moons to Jool+?

Yes, absolutely! I can't grant any permissions for the ones I didn't invent (Daphy, Eeloo, Fonso and Potatus), but the rest are fine!

Edited August 10, 2014 by Felsmak

So, here's yet another tribute to NovaSilisko! I'm not very good at mountains, unfortunately, so Fonso is best seen from a distance.

Satisfied?

Edited August 11, 2014 by Felsmak

That's... That's... OOOHHHHH MMMMMMYYYYYYYYYY KKOOOOOOOOODDD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! That. Is. PERFECT. Just. PERFECT. Thank you so much! I Absolutely LOVE the way you did Mania! Keep up the excellent work, and I already know that Hypat, it's moons, and Siliskus are going to be AMAZING!

Wow, loved these! Great work!

Could you share higher resolution versions of the ones in the OP? Particularly those of the stock bodies.

Could you share higher resolution versions of the ones in the OP? Particularly those of the stock bodies.

Not at the moment, I'm afraid. They're made in that size, so scaling them up would just look bad.

I might try and make something more hi-res in the future, however!

That's... That's... OOOHHHHH MMMMMMYYYYYYYYYY KKOOOOOOOOODDD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! That. Is. PERFECT. Just. PERFECT. Thank you so much! I Absolutely LOVE the way you did Mania! Keep up the excellent work, and I already know that Hypat, it's moons, and Siliskus are going to be AMAZING!

I'm glad you liked them! Here are Hypat and its moons as well. Now I just need Siliskus!

Edited August 11, 2014 by Felsmak

Not at the moment, I'm afraid. They're made in that size, so scaling them up would just look bad.

I might try and make something more hi-res in the future, however!

Aw, that's too bad! I was thinking those would make a great wallpaper for a KSP fan like me.
Brilliant work! Siliskus is going to be great, and are you going to make the 2 versions like I described?

Brilliant work! Siliskus is going to be great, and are you going to make the 2 versions like I described?

Thank you! And yes, one picture of the coma and one close-up of the nucleus!
Okay thanks, can't wait!
Created some Imgur albums to make the original post more compact. Thought it might be a good thing to do before the pictures set everyone's computers on fire!

And now a comet and another tribute to Nova! As you can see, it's named after him, and just because I remember the time when he developed the planets so fondly I even based the shape of the nucleus on Fry from Futurama, which was his avatar at the time.
Thanks! FANTASTIC work, I can't wait until Kopernicus is done so I can start making this!
I'm looking forward to seeing the result!

Nice!

Wait, on a semi-related topic... "Kerberos" is a real dwarf planet?

Nice!

Wait, on a semi-related topic... "Kerberos" is a real dwarf planet?

Yep, it's one of the two most recently discovered moons of Pluto (along with Styx). Basically it's just an alternate name for Cerberus, which was the choice on the poll that ultimately decided the names of these two new-found moons.

I've a question: Do you use Texture-Maps for the planets you draw before making them round or do you actually draw them round from the beginning. If you use Textures and i would ask you for a Gas Giant with specific description how it should look, then could you also share the Texture Map if you are finished so the design could actually be implemented in a planet Pack?

I'm not deeep in Graphic Design, so i don't know how you make these awesome planet drawings and don't know if it is possible or even included in your way of designing these?

They aren't 3D; I just draw them. I create a flat disc in Photoshop, and then I draw the cloud bands on it. Then I just apply a few effects to enhance it some more.

I'm sure I could create a texture map as well, though. After all It's really just a bigger and more rectangular gas giant. I would not be able to include the effects, though. So the planets would not look like this in the game.
